backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with access control, user profiles, and extensive resident-related data types and storage logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration utilities converting old resident data to a new format that adds codeStatus while preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components for code status display and editing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables and theming via Tailwind, including light/dark color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile setup modal logic, and app shell layout.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s ADL records in a table with an option to add new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form allowing users to create a new ADL record with date, activity, assistance level, and notes, submitting via useAddADLRecord.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with an option to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial user profile setup, capturing name, user type, and optional related resident IDs, then saving via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
Layout wrapper handling Internet Identity authentication and rendering the main app header, footer, and optional login screen.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records in a table and allows adding new records if permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for adding a MAR record, selecting an active medication and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Shows a resident’s medications with status, and supports adding, editing, or discontinuing medications when allowed.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for creating a new medication, managing form fields and submitting via useAddMedication.
Modal for editing an existing medication, pre-filling fields and submitting updates via useUpdateMedication.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Displays a badge indicating a resident’s code status as DNR or Full Code.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal for creating a new resident with detailed forms for personal data, physicians, contacts, and medications.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s personal info, physicians, and pharmacy details.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Print-friendly resident profile report showing demographics, code status, physicians, and other info.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a resident’s daily vital records in a table and provides a modal to record new vitals when permitted.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for entering a resident’s daily vital signs and submitting them via useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, stats, and clinical data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode styles, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Helper functions for checking user permissions and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Resident dashboard showing stats, resident list filtering/sorting, and a modal for adding new residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Renders the resident profile with tabs, clinical data modals, medication actions, printing, and permission checks. Handles loading, access control, and multiple modals for editing resident info and records.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from hash-based routing. Supports combining URL and session-based parameter retrieval.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, existing features, and pending feature requests related to adding and displaying resident code status.
